abstract: Rising number of chefs, restaurateurs and fishmongers in New York and around country are promoting consumption of lesser-known but more sustainable fish in effort to change Americans' entrenched eating habits.
lead_paragraph: Chefs, restaurateurs and fishmongers are taking on the mission of selling wild and local fish whose populations are not threatened with extinction.

headline.main: Seafood Restaurants Cast a Wider Net for Sustainable Fish

snippet: Chefs, restaurateurs and fishmongers are taking on the mission of selling wild and local fish whose populations are not threatened with extinction.
